channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024110108
item.description:
Report X-2024110108

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-03
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While screening shipment through x ray, found item that looked like aerosol can. Performed targeted physical search and found 1 can of flex seal. Removed item from shipment. 1 can x 2 ounces

item.description:

  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During Xray screening Ramp found an undeclared receiver and DG in cargo shipment. 7011 5161 15pieces 615lbs to PDX. Nolan Lougheed tendered the shipment using his company CID. Guests declined DG. Ramp found receiver and aerosols during Xray.
